document_data.name: Thargreve Obarskyr
document_data.mainbody:
ng of Cormyr|parents = [[Meurthe Obarskyr]]|dynasty = [[Obarskyr]]|start of reign = [[349 DR]]|end of reign = [[360 DR]]|predecessor = [[Barander Obarskyr|Barander the Tortured King]]|successor = [[Jarissra Obarskyr]]}}
'''Thargreve the Greater''' (real name '''Thargreve Obarskyr''') was the 47th [[Obarskyr]] monarch of [[Cormyr]]. He was the son of [[Meurthe Obarskyr|Meurthe the Mad]] and great-grandson of [[Gorauna Obarskyr|Gorauna]].
